item.title: 10x Research: South Korean Retail Traders Have Already Bought Over $12 Billion Worth of US Crypto Company Stocks This Year
item.description: On August 31st, the data indicates that individual investors in South Korea, who have been actively engaged in cryptocurrency investment, are expanding their investment scope by purchasing a large amount of cryptocurrency-related stocks listed in the US. 10x Research shows that South Korean retail investors have purchased more than $12 billion worth of US stocks in cryptocurrency companies this year, including Bitmine, Circle, and Coinbase.In August alone, South Korean investors bought $426 million worth of Bitmine, $226 million worth of Circle, and $183 million worth of Coinbase stocks. They also bought $282 million worth of a 2x Ethereum ETF. 10x Research points out: "South Korean investors are pouring billions of dollars into cryptocurrency stocks, which is reshaping global fund flows and attracting the attention of Wall Street. The stablecoin legislation in the US and South Korea has also provided a strong background for this wave of capital inflow."This trend is different from

item.title: California Governor Plans to Launch "Trump Corruption Coin" to Criticize Trump's Controversial Actions in the Cryptocurrency Space
item.description: On August 31st, as per Cointelegraph, California Governor Gavin Newsom recently disclosed plans to initiate a cryptocurrency named the "Trump Corruption Coin." This was done in direct response to Donald Trump's controversial actions within the crypto space, particularly in the Meme coin sector.Gavin Newsom, during an appearance on the "Pivot" podcast, stated that this Meme coin, which is named after Trump's alleged scandals, is part of his broader "Campaign for Democracy" initiative. The funds raised through this coin will be utilized for redistricting and voter outreach efforts.Gavin Newsom said in the interview, "We are on the verge of launching a meme coin. Trump, let's see which coin, yours or ours, gains more popularity." When asked if it would be called "Gavin Coin," he responded, "No, it is called the Trump Corruption Coin."He further added, "We merely aim to intensify the heat and make people aware of the absurdity of this situation." Gavin Newsom referred to Trump as "on

item.title: A whale deposited $5.96 million into HyperLiquid and went long on SOL and HYPE.
item.description: On August 31, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale deposited 5.96 million USDC into HyperLiquid and established a 20x leveraged long position on SOL and a 10x leveraged long position on HYPE.

item.title: Canary CEO: XRP Recognition on Wall Street Second Only to Bitcoin, XRP Demand Could Soar After ETF Launch
item.description: On August 31st, Steven McClurg, the CEO of Canary Capital, stated that the level of recognition of XRP among Wall Street professionals is second only to Bitcoin. If an XRP ETF receives approval from the US SEC, market demand could experience a significant surge.It is reported that Canary Capital submitted a spot XRP ETF registration application in October of the previous year, and it has not yet obtained regulatory approval.

item.title: WLFI Pre-market Price Surges Above $0.36, Up Over 30% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 31st, according to HTX market data, the pre-market price of WLFI (World Liberty Financial) exceeded $0.36 and is currently trading at $0.3602, with a more than 30% increase within the past 24 hours.According to Coinglass data, the total open interest of WLFI futures contracts across all exchanges is currently $7.38 billion, showing a 53.19% increase in the past 24 hours. The trading volume in the last 24 hours is $13.97 billion, with a rise of 89.145%. The current aggregated long-to-short ratio across all exchanges is 1.BlockBeats previously reported that the Trump family's project, World Liberty Finance (WLFI), is scheduled to launch on Ethereum on September 1st, with open claiming and trading. Early supporters (at the $0.015 and $0.05 rounds) will unlock 20%, while the remaining 80% will be determined through community voting. Tokens for the founding team, advisors, and partners will not be unlocked. Trading will start at 8 p.m. on September 1st (Beijing Time), and the 20

item.title: Ethereum Network Stablecoin Supply Surpasses $160 Billion, Reaching an All-Time High
item.description: On August 31st, according to the data from Token Terminal, the supply of stablecoins on the Ethereum network has exceeded $160 billion and reached a new record high. The supply of stablecoins has more than doubled since January 2024.

item.title: The high-profile ETH-to-BTC Whale has once again moved 2000 BTC to Hyperliquid in the last 6 hours for an ETH swap.
item.description: On August 31st, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a highly prominent BTC whale that has been actively swapping ETH has once again transferred 2000 BTC (valued at $218.24 million) to Hyperliquid within the past 6 hours in order to swap it for ETH.

item.title: 「Brother Buddy」 Huang Licheng currently holds approximately $130 million worth of ETH and HYPE long positions, with an unrealized loss of about $850,000
item.description: On August 31st, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight (accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD), the "Big Brother Whale" Huang Lizheng currently has approximately $130 million worth of long positions in ETH and HYPE. There is a floating loss of about $850,000. The details are as follows:· He holds 24,899 long positions in ETH, worth $111 million, with a floating loss of approximately $420,000. The opening price was $4,485.98, and the liquidation price was $3,066.· He holds 420,000 long positions in HYPE, worth $18.75 million, with a floating loss of about $430,000.

item.title: The US Stock Market will be closed tomorrow.
item.description: On August 31st, due to the U.S. Labor Day holiday, the U.S. stock market will be closed on September 1st (Monday). The precious metals and WTI crude oil futures contracts of CME will close early at 02:30 on September 2nd Beijing time, and the stock index futures contracts will close early at 01:00 on September 2nd Beijing time. The Brent crude oil futures contracts of ICE will close early at 01:30 on September 2nd Beijing time. (FX678)

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin Can Hedge Against Selling Pressure on US Bonds
item.description: August 31st. As per CoinDesk, André Dragosch, the European Research Director at Bitwise Asset Management, mentioned that when the stock market is in a downturn, gold serves as the most effective hedge. Meanwhile, Bitcoin demonstrates more resilience when the U.S. bond market is under pressure. Historical data and industry research also back this perspective: gold generally rises during stock market bear markets, while Bitcoin performs better during U.S. Treasury sell-offs.By 2025, the price of gold has increased by more than 30%, and Bitcoin has risen by approximately 16.46%. This reflects the significantly different roles that the two assets play when investors consider rising yields, stock market volatility, and Trump's support for cryptocurrency.
